thread.title: Mad Max violence stalks Venezuela's lawless roads

title: Mad Max violence stalks Venezuela's lawless roads
text:
Mad Max violence stalks Venezuela's lawless roads 11:57am EST - 01:43 
With hunger widespread amid a fifth year of painful economic implosion, Venezuela has seen a frightening surge in attacks on lorries transporting food, with many drivers now fearing for their lives. Ivor Bennett reports.
